pages.text: Blade Smithing Association is a group founded by smiths from all races.$(br)Meanwhile, it is the place where swordsman of Sword of Logos receive their Blades.$(br2)Only those smiths who are able to design and smith their own Blade can be titled a "Smith" and eligible to be a member of the Blade Smithing Association. While I am one of the main members of the Association.

I have explained how to smith blades in the previous episodes, and I will not repeat it.$(br2)After a Blade is smithed, you should make a Sheath to protect it.$(br)Make a Wooden Sheath then equip your Blade with it, then you will get a White Sheath of your own. Your Blade will then get a Coat of Arms of the Blade Smithing Association. It means you have successfully joined the Association.
